channel.title: Ilan Pappé on
channel.description: Recent content in Ilan Pappé on

item.title: On Palestine
item.description: Many of the world’s problems are so intractable that it’s hard to think of ways even to take steps toward mitigating them. The Israel-Palestine conflict is not one of these. I admit I’ve fallen prey to the line, re: the occupation of Palestine, “it’s too complex to understand.
